txt.en: Even as I write the name I remember his overbearing nature and I want to cross it out! But Galengam, for all of his apparent faults, has a force of personality I cannot deny. His knowledge of provisioning and supply may be very helpful on the voyage, and few allies are as loyal as those who believe they have a great deal to gain by the successful completion of your mission. He claims to be the King's Own Merchant? Then let him earn it!\n\nGalengam can be found inside his shop in Calembel, King's Gondor West.
